definition: The word "zerbrochen" refers to an action or state of an object that has undergone a significant change, resulting in it being damaged, shattered, or broken into pieces. It is commonly used to describe the physical destruction or fragmentation of an item, often due to an accident, impact, or forceful action. This term can also be employed metaphorically to convey a sense of emotional or psychological brokenness, indicating a deep sense of sadness, despair, or turmoil.
